PLEASE DO NOT REPLY TO THE LIST

Gentlemen,
	I have heard from seven of you who wanted the Haynes 
Catalogs. I can get them for $125 plus shipping. You will get issues 
2,3,4,6,7,8 and 9 in new mint condition. Shipping will depend on 
where you are located and how fast you want to receive them. Alan is 
putting together the sets for me and I will pick them up in a week or 
so.
	You know who you are please reconfirm for me if you still 
want the books at this price. Anyone interested please let me know 
now and we'll put together more sets. For the sake of everyones 
bandwidth do not reply to this email but contact me off list.

tom
